title: Courses
description: Embark on a journey of continuous learning with our curated selection of courses.

items.title: Alura
items.description: Learn Programming, Front-end, Back-end, Data Science, UX, DevOps, Innovation, and Management on Brazil's largest technology platform.

items.title: EBAC
items.description: EBAC offers a fast way to learn design and contemporary professions on the internet. Featuring open classes, online intensives, and courses for swift learning.

items.title: Rocketseat
items.description: The complete platform for you to learn programming from scratch at your own pace, become Full Stack, and specialize in various technologies without leaving home.

items.title: DevMedia
items.description: Learn to code for REAL, with fewer classes and more practice. Do real projects, ask questions all the time, talk to other programmers.

items.title: Curso em Video
items.description: Supercharge your resume with free Video Course courses. Learn computer science with free courses made by experts.

items.title: Origamid
items.description: Learn how to create websites. Classes in Programming, UX/UI Design, WordPress, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TypeScript and more.
